headline: 'Getting financial help through my GP has improved my health'
first_sentence: GP surgeries in south London are giving financial advice to help patients manage debt and handle benefits claims - and the results are striking.

headline: Boris Johnson left Inquiry in a hurry - he'll be pleased not to come back
first_sentence: Papers in hand, Boris Johnson arrived at the Covid Inquiry before the sun came up.

headline: Fly around or make out with your crush: how to start lucid dreaming
first_sentence: Usually, we don’t have much say in what we dream about.

headline: Pictured: Winning entries for Wildlife Photographer of the Year 2025
first_sentence: A brown hyena standing beside the ruins of an abandoned diamond mining settlement has earned wildlife photographer Wim van den Heever the title of Wildlife Photographer of the Year.

headline: Green turtle bounces back from brink in conservation 'win'
first_sentence: The green turtle has been rescued from the brink of extinction in what scientists are calling a major conservation victory.

headline: Environment prize nominees 'heroes of our time', says William
first_sentence: The Prince of Wales has described those in the running for his environmental Earthshot prize as "heroes of our time".

headline: Is the most expensive lip balm always the best?
first_sentence: Lip care is big business in the UK, worth an estimated £80m and promoted by celebs like Charli XCX.

headline: Amanda saves almost $1,000 on her mortgage thanks to a little-known product
first_sentence: SBS acknowledges the Traditional Custodians of Country and their connections and continuous care for the skies, lands and waterways throughout Australia.

headline: Vitamin pills and icy swims: Can you really boost your immune system?
first_sentence: And I feel like I've left my sanity as well as my warm clothes in the changing room as I stride out to the edge of a reservoir in my swim shorts.
